short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hollow Knight Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Hollow Knights background. Hollow Knight wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically refresh your Hollow Knight wallpaper with each new tab opening.
2. Choose or favorite a Hollow Knight wallpaper at random in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down important tasks.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel for streamlined website access.
10. Instant entry to Google applications.
11. Direct link to explore more themes.
12. Share effortlessly to social networks.
13. One-click wallpaper download.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Hollow Knight new tab.
